name: 弗农·里塔
introduction: Rieta started his Kung Fu training as a young boy in Hawaii in the Jing Mo Association. Rieta studied many styles of Kung Fu, Hung Gar and Tai Chi under many Masters. Over 3 decades ago Sifu Rieta came over to Mainland and started a school in Hollywood, CA. As an addition to be a popular teacher to youngsters and adults at many schools Sifu Rieta also worked over 17 years in the acting industry as an actor and stuntman.
